entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.4.2
entry.content:
Fixed

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.5.0
entry.content:
Added

  • âœ¨ Add Perplexity block (#2022) [172e17d]
  • âœ¨ (dify.ai) Add Query Knowledge Base action [49a17e6]
  • â• Add missing deps [0a75534]
  • ğŸ“ˆ Re-introduce group identifies [9738b4d]

Changed

  • ğŸ”§ Ignore Googlebot errors in Sentry [7c04667]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Tanstack and React [c83cfbc]
  • ğŸš¸ Added host image bubble expansion on click (#2035) [de6ae74]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade AI SDK and add Claude 3.7 [c7448eb]
  • ğŸ’„ (lp) Change UseCases layout. Bigger product screenshots [4f55518]
  • ğŸš¸ Properly handle viewer 404 [decc19a]
  • â™»ï¸ Lift right side bar state to the URL [07e1eb4]
  • ğŸ”§ Add Sentry typebotId tagging in chat API [61e401c]
  • ğŸš¸ (googleSheets) Properly catch updateRow errors [2597742]
  • â™»ï¸ Upgrade next-auth and clean up config [ce3c3ae]
  • ğŸ”§ Filter out more known errors/message from Sentry [fcef3da]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade lp deps and add cover blog post metadata [fc6a2ae]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve error handling with AI streaming [a6714ef]
  • ğŸ”§ Standardize error handling across AI and forge blocks [d8a08c8]
  • ğŸ”§ Fix WhatsApp reaction message schema [0b20650]
  • ğŸ”§ Improve Sentry error filtering with case-insensitive matching [74c69d9]
  • ğŸš¸ Add error logging for OpenAI assistant stream creation [f46cc47]
  • ğŸš¸ Add error logging for unconfigured forged blocks [f07cf79]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve error handling in AI generation functions [a634bb3]
  • â™»ï¸ Rename LogError to ClientToastError [c33ba97]
  • ğŸš¸ Gracefully handle google doc authentication with missing credId or spreadsheetId [d6b5578]
  • ğŸš¸ Gracefully handle and display createSpeech error [49e246a]
  • ğŸš¸ Handle more known error codes from WA preview webhook [a91b49b]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve WhatsApp setup client toast errors [971ab56]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve Google Sheets picker to filter spreadsheet files [e70ddd9]
  • ğŸš¸ Persist time filter state in URL in results tab [39a1408]
  • ğŸ’„ Change export results progress bar color [8ea15d5]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve credentials label explanations [8b329fe]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve File upload settings layout and explanation [a48f20f]
  • ğŸ’„ Remove question mark on switch labels [4cb0574]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Tanstack start [c9a04a7]
  • ğŸ”§ Refine WhatsApp error logging and Sentry reporting [fd9e0c9]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade trpc [6e81f1d]
  • ğŸ”§ Enhance WhatsApp error handling and Sentry integration [1f3ee6a]
  • ğŸš¸ Unify captured logs for better error reporting [d9df90c]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve toasts consistency and UI [c5025db]
  • ğŸ”§ Improve Sentry error filtering for tRPC messages [96eee2d]
  • ğŸš¸ Ignore update typebot conflict in builder [ab3caeb]
  • ğŸ”§ Improve Sentry error management [31bc698]
  • ğŸ”§ Add Sentry ignore error messages [57ef00c]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Sentry [f8f2eb2]
  • âš¡ Improve group title gen default prompt and add docs [983f71c]
  • ğŸ’„ Limit max height for set variable expression block content [89a77e4]
  • ğŸ’„ Enhance UI for create typebot and duplicate typebot pages [868dc53]
  • ğŸ’„ Improve sign-in page and form UI [19a9f74]
  • â¬‡ï¸ Downgrade posthog-node to 4.3.2 [4b277be]
  • â™»ï¸ Add sendMessage utility for webhook notifications [ce965e0]
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade posthog-node and remove useless group indentify events [c46c132]

Removed

  • ğŸ”¥ Remove workspaceId optionnality in chat session state [8d86535]
  • ğŸ”¥ Remove new version popup and related version check [11c1a32]

Fixed

  • ğŸ’š Fix sentry config type error [179e60b]
  • ğŸ› Make saveClientLogs retro compatible [a67204c]
  • ğŸ› Improve schema validation for optional number and variable types [9ce25de]
  • ğŸ› Adjust schema validation for optional number and variable types [bd3dc6e]
  • ğŸ› Attempt to fix published typebot refetch with null typebotId [c236c29]
  • ğŸ› (whatsapp) Accept system messages and optional metadata [26559f1]
  • ğŸ› Preprocess number or variable type to avoid unwanted validation crash [ccd794a]
  • ğŸ› Add support for WhatsApp sticker incoming messages [9afbf62]
  • ğŸ› Add sendCommand method to Typebot web embed [dccb9e8]
  • ğŸ› (remember) Properly save avatars history in storage [7509c5f]
  • ğŸ’š (whatsapp) Fix type error with new incoming schema def [385856e]
  • ğŸ› Fix potential crash on empty action in forged block [84f20ff]
  • ğŸ› Fix HTTP error parsing when json body is empty [f45f565]
  • ğŸ› Add support for incoming list reply [a4358d6]
  • ğŸ› Fix submit event type in PaymentForm [35cf88d]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix chat remembered state restoration [40aa716]
  • ğŸ› (webhook) Fix block not working when bot is embedded [95b7e28]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix typebot link not resuming [37c7669]
  • ğŸ› (whatsapp) Add "unsupported" incoming message type [bbb90b5]
  • ğŸ› Remove currentUserMode from getTypebots query [a6c639a]
  • ğŸ› Ignore WhatsApp message reactions in webhook handlers [b4ce205]
  • ğŸ› Fix export results progress calculation using total starts [6ee18f2]
  • ğŸ› Handle missing WhatsApp message gracefully [7ce7b7a]
  • ğŸ› Fix invalid auth token req [7da65db]
  • ğŸ› Fix potentially invalid call to getPublishedTypebot [5da2971]
  • ğŸ› Fix error parsing with response field [f2512eb]
  • ğŸ› Fix group gen onboarding video toggling on check off [5c43109]
  • ğŸ’š Attempt to fix lp build [c7e9f6d]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix streaming message stuck [8c8efc4]
  • ğŸ› Avoid sending useless queries when not having the rights [d3c4a53]
  • ğŸ› Enable dynamic theme for bot background [b7a8a9e]
  • ğŸ› Prevent wheel event default behavior in Firefox graph [20c3449]
  • ğŸ› Duplicate media objects on typebot import [6ff81b9]
  • ğŸ› Avoid country code reset on phone input emptying (#2000) [f20a2ed]
  • ğŸ› Fix Pop and shift variable side effect not working for string [ff0732e]
  • ğŸ’š Update remaining shutdownAsync method calls [c703162]
  • ğŸ’š Update PostHog client shutdown method [39b9c47]
  • ğŸ› (anthropic) Fix system message not taken into account in message stream [cc4c2bd]

Security

  • ğŸ”’ (typebotLink) Make sure fetched linked bot has matching workspaceId [1b281c6]
  • ğŸ”’ Respond 404 for suspended bots [748252b]

Miscellaneous

  • ğŸ‘· Attempt to fix hourly results report retry mechanism [388ba31]
  • ğŸ“ Update self-hosting deployment docs with database migration steps [0c3ce76]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Add configurable ToS URLs [8ad53de]
  • ğŸ“ Update blog post publication dates [481a338]
  • ğŸ“ Add "WhatsApp AI Agent" blog post [eb5e5ab]
  • ğŸ“ Add "AI Chabot with custom knowledge" blog post [5b73d5b]
  • ğŸ“ Add "FAQ chatbot" blog post [317a91b]
  • ğŸ“ Add "Flowise alternatives" blog post [a6325f9]
  • ğŸ“ Add "Best chatbot builder" blog post [a5b5862]
  • ğŸ“ Add "WhatsApp chatbot use cases" blog post [3262a28]
  • ğŸ“ Add "Typeform vs Google Form" blog post [eb96eba]
  • ğŸ“ Add Blink integration instructions [a54b27c]
  • ğŸ“ Add upcoming schema changelog [4599862]
  • ğŸ‘· Add PostHog environment variables to daily workflow [d9e23c1]
  • ğŸ‘· Improve hourly results tracking and error handling [6e889ec]
  • ğŸ‘· Enable daily results tracking and reporting [10b466b]
  • ğŸ‘· Auto retry hourly cron on failure [1f3afb5]
  • ğŸ“ Improve docker-compose examples (#2004) [2f57984]
  • ğŸ‘· Renovate cron jobs [b406f6c]
  • ğŸ¥… Catch sheet permission error [57adf62]
  • ğŸ¥… Filter out ClientToastError from Sentry [c99003c]
  • ğŸ“ Add command event page [dcc716c]
  • ğŸŒ Update payment collect label translations [fb3eda4]
  • ğŸ“ Add troobleshooting section on portainer network issues (#2025) [7f3118e]

  • Add Command event (#2017) [c93b4f4]

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Option to disable email rejection on registration [2f2064c]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.6.0
entry.content:
Breaking changes

Before upgrading, please make sure to read all the associated breaking changes.

New features

  • âœ¨ Add "Allowed file types" option in file upload input (#2103) [0861d63]
  • âœ¨ Introduce Blink block [615f9b0]
  • âœ¨ Add format options in number input block (#2080) [f515ef1]
  • âœ¨ Add Cards Input [b61b5f5]
  • âœ¨ Add Deepseek block (#2046) [812ece0]

UI/UX Improvements

  • ğŸš¸ Upgrade AI SDK and simplify model selection for OpenAI and Mistral [904bf82]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve list pasting in buttons [e74b95f]
  • âš¡ Add "Device type" set variable option [8771fd3]
  • ğŸš¸ Add internal values option in choice inputs (#2098) [e8c2f17]
  • ğŸš¸ Make entire screen scrollable when chat container is disabled [8049880]
  • ğŸ’„ (cards) Fix UI when getting non scrollable total cards [98dffad]
  • ğŸš¸ Attempt to parse URL with extension when downloaded publicly from WhatsApp [e03e7b8]
  • ğŸš¸ Add replyTo host email for guest and workspace invitations [4151804]
  • ğŸš¸ Allow for custom text in OpenRouter and Together blocks [bbb5a79]
  • ğŸš¸ Add network error system messages (#2084) [2a554cb]
  • ğŸš¸ Avoid displaying custom domains dropdown if user is not writer [7cca1cd]
  • âš¡ Add prompt and completion tokens to the save dropdown (#2070) [9a7624b]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve auto scroll to bottom decision [c760528]
  • ğŸš¸ Update GroupFocusToolbar to conditionally render copy and delete buttons based on read-only state [a52f74c]
  • ğŸš¸ Enhance PlaceholderNode with hitbox extension [5d15b70]
  • ğŸŒ Add more translations (#2051) [d1215c6]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix shrinking base URL in share page when entering edit [2417897]
  • ğŸš¸ Try to parse stringified array before loading them in as dynamic items [75814ef]
  • ğŸš¸ Persist language preference in database for better cross device experience (#2043) [ffd40e0]

Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix Forge CLI creation to use src directory [39f6b61]
  • ğŸš‘ Remove forgotten debug writeFilySyncs [411fb9f]
  • ğŸ› (whatsapp) Add contacts incoming message type [1796cf5]
  • ğŸ› Fix legacy openai empty messages issue [9d08b4b]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix matchByIndex function to use strict equality for index matching [6488df6]
  • ğŸ› Fix auth failing when given unknown fields on account linking [ca8c482]
  • ğŸ› Fix image expansion overflowing issue in bubble [0040575]
  • ğŸ› Fix new forged block constants injection [78194c1]
  • ğŸ› Make the "Device type" function work in iframes as well [74c8860]
  • ğŸ› Fix redirect popup toast invisible UI [f897694]
  • ğŸ› Add check for empty allowed origins in origin validation logic [54612a2]
  • ğŸ› Make allowed origins stricter and prevent the bot being consumable from public URL as mentioned in the docs [7f44ca4]
  • ğŸ› Fix help document URL for AB Test block [c9b57f5]
  • ğŸ› Fix "Pick an image" popover going behind (#2099) [0606fa3]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix chat chunks spacing [ce163b4]
  • ğŸ› Fix pause flow in WhatsApp runtime [ecb94e3]
  • ğŸ› Correctly reset state when streaming fails [413e29b]
  • ğŸ› (cards) Fix dynamic cards duplication [0c531af]
  • ğŸ› Prevent blocks sidebar closure when mouse exits left side of the screen [4a9efaa]
  • ğŸ› Fix copy pasting Jump blocks in a new typebot [68aab60]
  • ğŸ› Increase workspace modal width to fix truncation on some languages [c9519cb]
  • ğŸ› Fix emoji and icon display in bot [b0bed92]
  • ğŸ› Implement back optimistic user updates [b4029dc]
  • ğŸ› Fix typebot icon popover behind blocks sidebar [03a8531]
  • ğŸ› Update file input accept types to include AVIF format for image uploads [74ccd9c]
  • ğŸ› (editor) Fix block dropping on same group not detected [275d987]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix number validation when equals to 0 [9153337]
  • ğŸš‘ Avoid formatting number on reply parsing [e10d448]
  • ğŸš‘ Upgrade embed libs [793e174]
  • ğŸš‘ Re-apply default value to number input (#2082) [4cea601]
  • ğŸš‘ Upgrade embed libs [fd20942]
  • ğŸ› Tie globals object for each session [42d974f]
  • ğŸ› Improve GhostableItem validation and error logging [0003e72]
  • ğŸ› Fix variable list transformation logic [e9ac1fd]
  • ğŸ› Fix GhostableItem detection in StackWithGhostableItems [1512da0]
  • ğŸ› Improve error handling in StackWithGhostableItems [09e80d9]
  • ğŸ› Correctly save streaming error in logs [9e7e24b]
  • ğŸ› Fix sheets builder API endpoint should use workspaceId [ef94ba7]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Update condition documentation to clarify list handling with Greater and Less operators [ca46139]
  • ğŸ“ Add contribution guidelines [4d65bfc]
  • ğŸ“ Update local installation guide to include information about minio instance for file uploads [9fe956b]
  • ğŸ“ Update local installation guide with simplified commands and authentication options [0b77bd4]
  • ğŸ“ Add Mindeo logo to companies marquee [8c6839c]
  • ğŸ“ Add command event documentation image [9237337]
  • ğŸ“ Add "React website builders" blog post (#2044) [0980788]
  • ğŸ“ Add "How to accept payment on WhatsApp Business" blog post (#2042) [d9636a2]

Internal

  • ğŸ”¥ Remove deprecated `edgeIdToTriggerWhenDone` prop in typebotsQueue [bd4520c]
  • ğŸ”§ Add @ark-ui/react dependency to typebot UI package [e5b22d1]
  • ğŸ”§ Migrate to bun.lock and update Dockerfile to use prune with bun [6ab3c95]
  • â™»ï¸ Move blink block code to src folder [074687e]
  • ğŸ”§ Introduce 'isShared' property to Typebot model" [d8b3b84]
  • ğŸ”§ Introduce 'isShared' property to Typebot model [18459bc]
  • ğŸ”’ Improve brand badge CSS protection [1518033]
  • ğŸ”§ Improve error details extraction [cb93198]
  • ğŸ”§ Fix default docker compose file, add db to same network [d79dfbb]
  • ğŸ”§ Add debug logging for error details in WhatsApp message handling [ee0aaa9]
  • â™»ï¸ Add display names for StackWithGhostableItems components [f4b43c0]
  • ğŸ”§ Improve new results tracking only tracking non-zero, per typebot [3d3f192]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.7.0
entry.content:
New features

  • âœ¨ Add "Send Feed Event" Blink action [14b1a26]
  • âœ¨ Add "Return" logic block [ecda1d8]
  • âœ¨ (openai) Add new 4.1 models [86e8477]

UI/UX Improvements

  • ğŸ’„ Fix long tag overflowing in tags input [48531c0]
  • ğŸš¸ (analytics) Take into account Jump blocks for analytics [6cd0705]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix chat bubble window dynamic height on mobile [04d2a2d]
  • ğŸš¸ Add error toast on workspace member inviation failure [f2a3ff0]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix border on file attached on text input [26fd11a]
  • ğŸ’„ Remove hero height constraint on mobild to fix scroll glitch [10cf18d]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix condition items overflow with long variable names [9305ae8]
  • ğŸš¸ (lp) fix scroll glitch ios due to vh height [b69d76d]
  • ğŸ’„ (lp) remove book a demo button [9cc6054]
  • ğŸš¸ (auth) Add user change email form [47107e3]
  • ğŸ’„ fix combobox input border color [1f133d1]
  • ğŸš¸ Place button settings floating button on top right [786accd]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix Items list top alignment [3c11131]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve pexels picker with options [14d341f]
  • ğŸš¸ (calCom) Add custom question prefill option [42cf1f3]

Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix getInDepthAnalyticsData invalid request when typebot is not defined [30d5ceb]
  • ğŸ› Fix webhook listening error when body is not JSON [9a1907d]
  • ğŸ› Fix restore published bot not working on v6.1 [e1c7c27]
  • ğŸ› Fix buttons invalid reply when internal value is empty string [79254cb]
  • ğŸ› Add ENTERPRISE plan in hasProPerks helper function [abde422]
  • ğŸ› Map allow comments and reation Blink options [0027867]
  • ğŸ› Fix black background not showing on popup embed [1f1baad]
  • ğŸ› Fix resetOutgoingEdgeIdProp, look for from props only [ba338b1]
  • ğŸ› Fix cards block duplication [a78498f]
  • ğŸ› Update invitation count query to exclude guests from existing members [1d43f14]
  • ğŸ› (condition) matched condition without connected edge should end the session [a43173c]
  • ğŸ› Fix Else item not displayed [85eafc2]
  • ğŸ’š Fix CI build [8a9e16e]
  • ğŸ› (cards) Dynamic internal value not being saved [ec5bd44]
  • ğŸ› Fix svg image not displaying on Firefox [7807d4c]
  • ğŸ› Fix file re-upload not working [d007ad0]
  • ğŸ› Fix TypebotHeader overlapping blocks settings window [148b64d]
  • ğŸ› Fix results files duplication on typebot duplication [ee8a41c]
  • ğŸ’š Explicitely add GITHUB_TOKEN in auto tag workflow [547ecac]
  • ğŸ› Fix clientSideActions executed from linked bot [98309fc]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix maximum callstack size issue from setVariableHistory [21767d2]
  • ğŸ› Fix copy/paste not pasting variable ids in block items [08ad395]
  • ğŸ› Correctly update startTimeout in exec loop [2a85bb2]
  • ğŸ› Correctly update start time in group execution loop [98b3383]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix edge case when calling link to typebot after input [601ddf3]
  • ğŸ› Fix starting preview from group not working [25808a9]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix previous typebot link freeze [6953a5e]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix typebot link block freeze [54ed980]
  • ğŸ’š Fix cards options type error [997c455]
  • ğŸ› (cards) Fix variables saving not working [ea53db5]
  • ğŸ› Fix buttons border color not applied [4836bf1]
  • ğŸ› Fix ColorPicker behind other elements in theme config [a88fa63]
  • ğŸ’š (lp) Fix window is not defined error from embed bubble loading [ba5dafb]
  • ğŸ› Add Cote D'Ivoire (+225) to country code options [77818e4]
  • ğŸ› Update contacts schema in OpenAPI definitions to use arrays for contacts and phones [508d339]
  • ğŸ› (whatsapp) Update incomingMessageSchema to use an array for contacts [9c1e82a]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "feedback chatbot" blog post (#2140) [ea91378]
  • ğŸ“ Add "lead generation form examples" blog post (#2054) [8a20050]
  • ğŸ“ Add "HTML Form Generator" blog post (#2011) [43bacc4]
  • ğŸ“ Add v3.6 newsletter [f47eda9]
  • ğŸ“ Update settings documentation to include system messages feature [19d1a56]
  • ğŸ“ Add Query Knowledge Base section to Dify.AI documentation [93908a9]
  • ğŸ“ Add formatting options for Number input block documentation [24c6278]
  • ğŸ“ Update Buttons documentation to include item options and display conditions [b8a63a9]
  • ğŸ“ Add Security Policy doc [ba02684]

Internal

  • ğŸ”§ Add "Missing credentialsId" to Sentry ignore messages [9c1b980]
  • â™»ï¸ Improve transcript computation for jump and return blocks [8ab1f02]
  • ğŸ”§ Update GitHub Actions workflow to use CONTENTS_RW_PAT for GITHUB_TOKEN [d32b6f8]
  • â™»ï¸ Migrate chat api schemas to its own package [1217bd5]
  • ğŸ—ƒï¸ Add Enterprise to Plan enum [9844126]
  • ğŸ”’ Add necessary auto add project workflow PAT [a95364f]
  • ğŸ”’ Remove use of PAT in Github workflows [59627ab]
  • â™»ï¸ Simplify walk the flow logic in bot engine (#2127) [81ef7df]
  • â™»ï¸ Misc types improvement (#2120) [fe8469f]

Miscellaneous

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Use custom HOSTNAME and PORT in docker entrypoints (#2148) [ce637fb]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Upgrade to next-auth v5 and next v15 [3f53bfe]
  • ğŸ©¹ Fix "Generated HTML" auto height [8d7163d]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.7.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix host trusting issue for self-hosting instances [9737fee]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "Chatbot Survey Questions" blog post (#2149) [71be123]
